mapper.select: select c.classes_id, c.classes_name, c.creator_id, c.introduction, c.people_num, u.nick_name as creator_name from t_classes c left join t_user u on u.user_id = c.creator_id where c.classes_id = #{classesId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_classes(classes_name, creator_id, introduction, people_num) values(#{classesName},#{creatorId},#{introduction},#{peopleNum})
mapper.update:
update t_classes
classes_name = #{classesName},
introduction = #{introduction},
people_num = #{peopleNum},
where classes_id = #{classesId}
